c:atomType.name: AxisOverlappedLabelsMode
c:atomType.c:documentation: The layout modes that handle the situation where labels of axes ticks overlap.

c:atom.name: Hide
c:atom.c:documentation:
Hide labels that overlap.
Between two labels, as many as required are hidden until the minimum specified spacing is respected.
In the place of the hidden labels, a dot is placed that, when hovering over, indicates the value of the hidden labels.

c:atom.name: Rotate
c:atom.c:documentation: Rotate the labels so that they do not overlap. If not possible, allows the labels to overlap.

c:atom.name: RotateThenHide
c:atom.c:documentation: Rotate the labels so that they do not overlap. If not possible, hides the labels that still overlap.
